scripts.install:showcase-ios: yarn initialize && cd demos/showcase && yarn && cd ios && pod install && cd ../../.. && yarn link:components
scripts.install:showcase-android: yarn initialize && cd demos/showcase && yarn && cd ../.. && yarn link:components
scripts.install:storybook-ios: cd demos/storybook && yarn && cd ios && pod install && cd ../../.. && yarn link:components
scripts.install:storybook-android: cd demos/storybook && yarn && cd ../.. && yarn link:components
scripts.install:storybook-api: cd demos/api && yarn && cd ../.. && yarn link:components
